General.Name: Mitra Komunikasi Nusantara Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mitra Komunikasi Nusantara Tbk distributes, trades, and sells telecommunication products in Indonesia. The company offers telecommunication cellular products, including smartphones, sim cards, tablets/pads, prepaid vouchers, and network products. It also provides trading services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

1.Name: Mr. Oki  Santosa
1.Title: Head of Internal Audit & Accounting Supervisor
